Common.addon-description:
A thing wide lens in perfect condition. Designed to spread the Flashlight beam at the cost of reducing its range of effectiveness.
Moderately increases the Flashlight Beam's width.
Slightly decreases the Flashlight Beam's range.

A tiny Flashlight bulb that packs more wattage for a brighter, more powerful light beam.
Slightly increases the Flashlight Beam's brightness.
Slightly increases the Blindness duration.
"Even the most powerful light cannot pierce through the Black Fog's darkness."

A leather strip wrapped around the Flashlight for more grip.
Slightly increases the Flashlight Beam's accuracy.
"Too many have fallen due to sweaty hands."

A standard battery of unknown brand.
Adds 2 seconds of use to a standard Flashlight.
"Another nearly empty battery."

Uncommon.addon-description:
A lens and reflector combo which can magnify a Flashlight's beam.
Moderately increases the Flashlight Beam's brightness.
Moderately increases the Blindness duration.
"Let the light burn them out of their dark shroud."

A rubber grip specifically fitting Flashlights for more grip.
Moderately increases the Flashlight Beam's accuracy.

A filament bulb designed to extend a Flashlight battery's life.
Moderately decreases the Flashlight's Battery Consumption rate.

A battery marked as "industrial strength".
Adds 4 seconds of use to a standard Flashlight.
"A battery advertised as lasting 8 hours lasts only a couple of seconds in The Black Fog."

A thick glass lens that focuses the Flashlight beam to increase its intensity.
Slightly increases the Flashlight Beam's range.
Slightly increases the Flashlight Beam's brightness.
Slightly increases the Blindness duration.
Slightly decreases the Flashlight Beam's width.

Rare.addon-description:
A recent model of battery that lasts longer.
Adds 6 seconds of use to a standard Flashlight.

A chemical bulb that generates an intensely clear light.
Considerably increases the Flashlight Beam's brightness.
Considerably increases the Blindness duration.

Very Rare.addon-description:
A wide lens made of unscratchable sapphire that optimises the power and range of the light beam.
Slightly increases the Flashlight Beam's range.
Moderately increases the Flashlight Beam's width.
Moderately increases the Flashlight Beam's brightness.
Moderately increases the Blindness duration.

Ultra Rare.addon-description:
A heavy and completely opaque bulb of unknown origin which emits a faint light even when turned off.
Tremendously increases the Flashlight Beam's brightness.
Tremendously increases the Blindness duration.
Slightly increases the Flashlight's Battery Consumption rate.

Common.addon-description:
Tightly knitted rope used in praying rituals. Can be attached to the Key.
Adds 10 seconds of use to the Key.
"Pray all you want, your words are getting lost somewhere up there, in the Fog."

Uncommon.addon-description:
A porous and scratched white pearl. A minuscule jump ring allows the pearl to be attached to the Key.
Moderately increases the range of the Key's Aura-reading ability.

A chain of matte beads of various sizes used in praying ritual. Can be attached to the Key.
Adds 15 seconds of use to the Key.

A heavily worn out token made of brass. If an inscription or drawing was once engraved in it, it has today completely disappeared. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the Key's Aura-reading ability.
Reveals Survivors' Auras when within 24 metres of range.

Rare.addon-description:
A gold token with a dull appearance. Both faces are smooth and void of any inscriptions. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the Key's Aura-reading ability.
Reveals Survivors' Auras when within 48 metres of range.

Very Rare.addon-description:
A mundane key ring in appearance with an unusual bluish dark sheen. The ring binds the Key to the user, preventing its loss even in the darkest of times.
Do not lose the Key on death, lose this Add-on instead.

This opaque piece of glass emits a dull vibrating noise. When the Skeleton or Dull Key is used to unlock a Black Lock, the glass token protects the Key from breaking, channelling the Black Fog's energy into the glass.
Do not lose the Key when unlocking a Hatch , lose this Add-on instead.

A blood-red amber striped with black veins. The amber is warm to the touch. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the Key's Aura-reading ability.
Reveals the Killer's Aura when within 32 metres of range at the great expense of the Key's energy.

An engraved wedding ring that emerged from The Fog and resonates with an indescribable and incomprehensible energy.
Reveals the Obsession's Aura.
Decreases your chances to be The Killer's Obsession.

Common.addon-description:
A fragmented piece of a thick fibrous material. A partial and faded map is drawn on it which by itself is useless.
Adds a 5 second charge to any Map.

Uncommon.addon-description:
A small electrical wire. Both ends are heavily damaged like it has been forcefully torn out of its intended location. Can be tied around a map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
Unlocks the ability to track Exit Gates .

A wooden stamp with a cross-hatched rubber pad used to mark documents. It is unclear as to how or by whom this stamp was originally used. Can be used with a map.
Moderately increases the range of the map tracking ability.

A slimy, translucent substance with a ghastly lavender shade. This jelly from unknown origin is highly resistant to heat.
Moderately slows down the burning rate of the map.

A bristly and rough piece of twine of a deep red colour. Can be tied around a map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
Unlocks the ability to track Killer Belongings.

A strange bead circled with gold that can be used to magnify the map and mark a specific position. The bead emits an energy which can be felt and seen by Survivors.
Unlocks the Marker Ability on secondary action.
Creating a marker that can be seen by all the Survivors.

Rare.addon-description:
A stamp carved out of sturdy blonde wood. The text found at the base is incomprehensible: "kw'zvre'od". Can be used with a map.
Considerably increases the range of the map tracking ability.

A smooth black cord with a soft appearance. Can be tied around a map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
Unlocks the ability to track the Black Lock.

Very Rare.addon-description:
An intricate set of lenses wrapped up in an astonishingly complex apparatus. The gears controlling the lenses' focus move by themselves as to focus on something invisible to humans.
Every Survivor sees the Aura generated by the map when the owner activates it.

Common.addon-description:
Disposable medical gloves to avoid cross-contamination.
Moderately increases the Progression bonus for succeeding at Great Skill Checks .

Medical quality tape used to close small wounds.
Slightly increases the Healing speed.

A pack of bandages usually found in First Aid Kits.
Adds 8 charges to the Med-Kit.

Uncommon.addon-description:
A mundane sponge used to soak up extra blood, providing easier access to wounds.
Considerably increases the Progression bonus for succeeding at Great Skill Checks .

A pack of bandages that stick to themselves without the need of clips for a faster patch-up that requires less readjustments.
Adds 8 charges to the Med-Kit.
Slightly increases the Healing speed.

Not exactly a medical device, however it can be used to quickly and painfully close up a wound.
Moderately increases the chances of triggering a Skill Check .
Slightly increases the Healing speed.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for succeeding Great Skill Checks.

Scissors designed to easily cut through textiles.
Moderately increases the Healing speed.

A sterile gauze used for a variety of wounds. Part of a total wound care system.
Adds 12 charges to the Med-Kit.

Rare.addon-description:
A medical device used to close and hold body tissue. Even though it's very effective, the surgical suture is challenging to use.
Considerably increases the chances of triggering a Skill Check .
Slightly increases the Healing speed.
Grants 150 % Bonus Bloodpoints for succeeding Great Skill Checks.

A pack of gel forming pads used to patch up heavily exuding wounds.
Adds 16 charges to the Med-Kit.

A highly absorbent pad that prevents bodily fluid leakage when applied to large abdominal wounds.
Considerably increases the Healing speed.
Reduces Charges by 8.

Very Rare.addon-description:
A white powder with coagulant properties. Apply the agent to a wound to stop it from haemorrhaging.
Use with Secondary Action.
When the Styptic Agent is used on an injured Survivor, they gain the Endurance  Status Effect for 8 seconds.Any damage taken during that time that would put the Survivor into the Dying State will instead apply the Deep Wound  Status Effect.The Survivors has then 20 seconds to mend themselves.
If the Survivor takes any damage while affected by Deep Wound or if the Deep Wound timer ends, they will immediately be put into the Dying State .
Depletes the Med-Kit on use.

Ultra Rare.addon-description:
An anti-haemorrhagic substance that stops the bleeding in a matter of seconds.
Use with Secondary Action.
The affected Survivor will passively gain one Health State 16 seconds after use.
The time required can be modified by Perks and Add-ons that affect Healing speeds.
This effect is cancelled when the affected Survivor changes their Health State  or is picked up by the Killer.
Depletes the Med-Kit on use.

Common.addon-description:
Useful tool to clamp hoses or hold wires in place and prevent damage or injury.
Slightly increases repair Skill Check success zones.

Springs, screws and gears. Mostly unusable junk.
Adds 15 charges to the Toolbox.

A mundane rag. Suspiciously clean.
Slightly increases the Toolbox's repair speed.

Uncommon.addon-description:
A portable but heavy spool of copper wire.
Adds 30 charges to the Toolbox.

Swivels provide bend and flexibility for bolts that are out of reach, deep within mechanical devices.
Moderately increases the Toolbox repair speed.

Thick gloves, which reduce menial dexterity but protect hands from injury.
Slightly increases the chances to trigger a sabotage Skill Check.
Slightly increases sabotage Skill Check success zones.
Considerably reduces the sabotage Skill Check failed penalty.

Someone quickly painted what seems to be repair instructions on this piece of bark.
Moderately increases the Toolbox's repair efficiency.

An adjustable wrench with a tough grip. Essential in any Toolbox.
Moderately increases repair Skill Check success zones.

A rudimentary cutting tool made from a jagged metal wire and two wooden handles.
Slightly increases the Toolbox's sabotage speed.

Rare.addon-description:
A small hand saw mounted with a metal cutting blade.
Moderately increases the Toolbox's sabotage speed.

Ultra Rare.addon-description:
This intricate mechanical part feels oddly out of place. It is clean and shiny as if straight out of the factory.
Toolbox Repair action is replaced with Install Brand New Part.
Installing the Brand New Part will complete 15 % of a Generator over 5 seconds.
During the install, you will be faced with 2 difficult Skill Checks.
Hitting each Skill Check will result in 5 % progression each for a maximum of 25 % added progression.
This Add-on is consumed on use.
